translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Yasas
“When the Lord of the World had attained Nibbāna,
when Siddhattha, the Leader of the World, had attained Nibbāna,
and made an offering to the Relics.
I made an offering to the Relics,
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of making an offering to the Relics.
My defilements have been burnt up,
I have done what the Awakened One said.

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā aparauttaratthero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmai aparauttara ttheraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: I have done what the Awakened One said.”🔽Thus the venerable Elder Aparauttara recited these verses.
The Elder Aparauttara’s Birth Story, the seventh.
